Text:
I have some problems with the game.
1. I have no sound. Even in the game menu the sound options are inaccessible.
2. When i try to change the character's skin color the skin turns into a smooth silvery texture. 

My operating system is win7 x 64... any suggestions?

there are other threads in the bioware neverwinter social forums that might help, but look over this install thread.
